name: inerrant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a religious book is inerrant, it contains no faults or mistakes: She believes that the Bible is the inerrant word of God. As a devout Muslim, he maintains that the Koran is God's final and inerrant word.
More examplesFewer examplesI would not say that the book is inerrant, but I think it is very useful as a guide.They insisted that all their students treated the Bible as an inerrant authority.Members of the group believe that the Bible is inerrant and that it accurately predicts the end of the world.
